3.5 Primer.Floats Float Grid

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard button suitable for clicking.

Examples
Default styling
.element { @include span-columns(6); .nested-element { @include span-columns(2 of 6); } }
:hover
Highlights when hovering.
.element { @include span-columns(6); .nested-element { @include span-columns(2 of 6); } }
Markup: grid/float.twig 
<code> <span class="nc">.element</span> <span class="p">{</span>
   <span class="k">@include</span> <span class="nd">span-columns</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="m">6</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="nc">.nested-element</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">@include</span> <span class="nd">span-columns</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="m">2</span> <span class="n">of</span> <span class="m">6</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span></code>
